column2: "In the year 201306151707 of the Observable Universe Calendar
column3:
Dark Lord Dinner Ebitender of the Observable Universe Empire 
devised a plan to annihilate the insufferable Rebel Army 
by constructing an overwhelmingly powerful ultimate weapon..."

column2: "He requested proposals for armaments from \nhis totally reliable vendors..."
"And awaited reports from his totally genius middle managers..."
"The ultimate weapon construction project is about to begin..."
Believes that quick decisions are everything. His explanations are clear.
Reverts the appearance changes of proposals
A cost-cutting expert. Always thinking about golf.
Makes the appearance of proposals golf-themed
Knowledgeable in technology. Her explanations are long-winded.
Increases the performance of proposed equipment
Develops cannons and missiles.\nProposes weapons embodying the spirit of the samurai whenever possible.
Develops barriers and armor. Has a penchant for creating thermal exhaust ports.
Fires a beam every {{.IntervalSec}} seconds for {{.LastSec}} seconds. Damage: {{.Power}} per second
Launches a homing missile every {{.IntervalSec}} seconds. Damage: {{.Power}}
"A katana that tracks enemies up to {{.MaxSanity}} times and eventually returns to the mothership.\nDamage: {{.Power}}"
Blocks {{.Durability}} attacks and regenerates after {{.IntervalSec}} seconds if broken
Increases the initial HP of the space fortress by {{.Armor}}
"A traditional weak point.\nMultiplies incoming damage by {{.Multiplier}}
A structure composed of {{.Value}} megaliths that can determine the summer solstice
A large theater with a capacity of {{.Value}} people

Vendor proposals will come up
from the bottom of the screen via the middle managers.
Use mouse movements to operate the bar at the top of the screen
and pass through the equipment you want to accept.
The negotiation ends when you run out of money.

Rotate the space fortress's equipment
with mouse movements to annihilate the Rebel Army.
The game ends when either the Rebel Army is annihilated
or the space fortress's HP is depleted.
The Observable Universe Empire has triumphed.\nThe glory of the Empire shall be eternal...
The Rebel Army has triumphed.\nThe era of hyperspace communication\nmutual surveillance democracy begins...
